A

ACTION_APP_REGISTRATION_EVENT - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Action sent to your broadcast receiver when a registration event occurs.
ACTION_RECEIVE_ADM_MESSAGE - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Action sent to your broadcast receiver when a message arrives for your app.
ACTION_REGISTER - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Action to start a registration operation.
ACTION_SYNC - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Action to rebroadcast current registration state.
ACTION_UNREGISTER - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Action to start an unregistration operation.
ADM - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
This class provides the core methods to support registering an app instance to use Amazon Device Messaging (ADM).
ADM(Context) - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADM
The entry point to ADM.
ADM_PACKAGE_NAME - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
Package name of the Amazon Device Messaging service
ADMConstants - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
This class contains error strings and special key strings passed with ADM messages.
ADMConstants.LowLevel - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
This class provides constants that are used only if you are crafting intents manually.
ADMManifest - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging.development
This class contains utility methods and constants to assist with authoring a manifest that supports ADM.
ADMMessageHandlerBase - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
This class allows your app to receive messages sent via ADM.
ADMMessageHandlerBase(String) - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessageHandlerBase
Protected constructor for creating an instance of ADMMessageHandlerBase.
ADMMessageHandlerJobBase - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
This class allows your app to receive messages sent via ADM.
ADMMessageHandlerJobBase() - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessageHandlerJobBase
 
ADMMessageReceiver - Class in com.amazon.device.messaging
Extend this class to forward Amazon Device Messaging (ADM) messages to your ADMMessageHandlerBase subclass.
ADMMessageReceiver() - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessageReceiver
If your ADMMessageHandlerBase or ADMMessageHandlerJobBase subclass uses the default name ( ADMManifest.DEFAULT_MESSAGE_HANDLER_CLASS_NAME), this associates this ADMMessageReceiver with your subclass.
ADMMessageReceiver(Class<? extends ADMMessageHandlerBase>) - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessageReceiver
Creates a new ADMMessageReceiver instance associated with your ADMMessageHandlerBase subclass.
ADMMessageReceiver(Class<? extends ADMMessageHandlerJobBase>, int) - Constructor for class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessageReceiver
Creates a new ADMMessageReceiver instance associated with your ADMMessageHandlerJobBase subclass.

E

ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants
Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when an authentication failure occurs.
ERROR_INVALID_SENDER - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants
Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service did not recognize your API Key.
ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants
Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service is unavailable.
EXTRA_APPLICATION_PENDING_INTENT - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An "empty" pending intent you use to identify your app to ADM.
EXTRA_ERROR - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra that ADM passes to your registration event receiver in the case of an error in registration or unregistration.
EXTRA_ERROR_DESCRIPTION - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra that ADM passes to your registration event receiver in the case of an error in registration or unregistration.
EXTRA_MD5 - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants
An extra in the Intent provided to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onMessage(android.content.Intent) containing the MD5 hash of the message payload.
EXTRA_REGISTRATION_ID - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra that ADM passes to your registration event receiver on successful registration.
EXTRA_SENDER - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra for registration intents that supply a comma delimited list of allowed senders.
EXTRA_SYNC_STATE - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra that ADM passes to your registration event receiver in the case of an error in registration or unregistration.
EXTRA_UNREGISTERED - Static variable in class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants.LowLevel
An intent extra that ADM passes to your registration event receiver on successful unregistration.

S
